narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This 3rd pre-license inspection for a Class "C" license and exit briefing were conducted with Bev Hicks (ACI), Dr.
Erika Leisner (VMO) and the applicant.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITY CAN OCCUR UNTIL YOU HAVE BEEN ISSUED YOUR USDA LICENSE.
The license fee must be mailed to the following address:
USDA-APHIS-AC
2150 Centre Ave. Bldg. B
Mail Stop #3W11
Fort Collins, CO 80526
